synopsis.text: The anime centers around Chi, an energetic and sweet kitten, as she enjoys her days playing with her close friends - the ever-loyal Comet, the daring Ann, and the thoughtful Telly. Together, they roam their surroundings in search of new adventures, whether it's discovering hidden gem locations or simply fooling around and enjoying each other's company. As the second season begins, Chi and friends continue their fun-filled escapades around town. With an underlying theme of travel and adventure, each day brings new excitement for the tightly-knit group of animal friends. Through the highs and lows, their unbreakable bond shines through. Capturing the innocence of childhood friendship, this charming anime promises to deliver plenty of heartwarming moments. Viewers are bound to fall for the lovable characters as they tag along on their endless adventures.
